JobFullDesc: As one of the world’s leading asset managers, we are solely dedicated to delivering an investment experience that helps people get more out of life. If you're looking for challenging work, smart colleagues, and a global employer with a social conscience, explore your potential at InvescoThe DepartmentOur mission is to create world-class, client-centric technology solutions that drive competitive advantage, grow our global business, and deliver an investment experience that helps people get more out of life. This mission is fueled by inventive and cohesive teams, which thrive on collaboration and shared trust and demonstrate the diversity of thought. Our success is driven by our people, which is why we invest heavily in our talent, promoting continuous learning and development, offering opportunities to work with new technologies, and crafting the space to discover.Our high-performing, OneTech team is seeking candidates who innovate, operate effectively in an agile environment, challenges the status quo and are driven to succeed Your RoleThe Sr Network and Automation Engineer role will have an exciting opportunity to work with and lead various technologies across a large global enterprise environment. A network background in the entire stack including route/switch, firewall, Internet Edge design, cloud, and automation is helpful.The Sr Network and Automation Engineer is a hands-on role in crafting various network architectures and additionally passionate about delivering high-value workflows for our Network Automation Team. This role will engineer and maintain a global deployment of datacenters, DMZ’s, MPLS, Campus, Cloud, and Automation. This is hands with Major Incidents You will be responsible for: Provided Network On-Prem and Cloud Engineering Solutions Leads designs and drives implementation of priority network deployment projects Engineer datacenter and campus solutions for route/switch, firewalls, load balancers, WAN, wireless, cloud, and automation Work Hands-on with Network Automation tools such as Ansible and/or Terraform Work Hands-on building Network Automation workflows Understand and drive CI/CD pipeline development and automation Find opportunities and make recommendations to improve availability, reliability, efficiency, performance, and overall service Provide clear documentation of technical solutions and communicate plans to management and customersThe experience you bring: 7-10 years experience managing various network architectures in a large enterprise 2-3 years experience deploying automation workflows 1-3 years experience deploying cloud solutions Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Computer ScienceWhat’s in it for you?Our people are at the very core of our success.
